column9: at magnolia regional health center in corinth. she was a member of oldham baptist church. she loved music and singing
column10: even playing the cello herself at a younger age. she enjoyed needlepoint
column12: and playing bingo at the nursing home. visitation is scheduled for 6 until 9 pm on friday
column13: june 12 at cutshall funeral home in iuka. funeral services are scheduled for 3 pm on saturday
column16: at cutshall funeral home chapel in iuka
column17: officiated by bro. john bray and bro. briggs king. interment will follow in cypress grove cemetery. pallbearers include joey beck
column23: and cyrus cornelius. cutshall funeral home of iuka
column24: ms is entrusted with arrangements. she is survived by 1 daughter debra seago of iuka; 1 son larry seago (tracy) of tishomingo; 1 sister margaret bean (rex) of grand rapids
column25: mil; and 2 special daughters daris barnes and cheryl marlar. she was preceded in death by her parents
column26: ernest and gwendolen hartman; her half-sister
column28: dagne register; and her adopted brother
